entry.title: Six by Nine is the answer
entry.summary:
Welcome to my blog!

You must be interested why this post's title implies unseemly and inappropriate thoughts, and obviously it is clearly improper way to start blogging. Don't worry, because six by nine in base 13 is 42. Which is the answer to the ultimate question of life, the universe …
entry.content:
Welcome to my blog!

You must be interested why this post's title implies unseemly and inappropriate thoughts, and obviously it is clearly improper way to start blogging. Don't worry, because six by nine in base 13 is 42. Which is the answer to the ultimate question of life, the universe and everything! Yes, on this very first post I'd like to do some philosophy, because today is the day I have been discharged from hospital, after severe pneumonia, and all this I've been doing lots of thinking. You know, when you spend a month in a hospital bed you kind of have plenty of free time with yourself, to think and analyze what is going on around you.

function codestyling() {
    $('pre code').each(function(i, e) {
        var code = $(this);
        var lines = code.html().split(/\n/).length;
        var numbers = [];
        for (i = 1; i < lines; i++) {
            numbers += '<span class="line">' + i + '</span>';
        }
        code.parent().append('<div class="lines">' + numbers + '</div>');
    });
}
codestyling();
